name: PhilanthropX
tag_list: philanthropx, social-media, social-networking, charity, sponsor, donate, register, login, sign-up
overview:
PhilanthropX is a social media website dedicated to Philanthropy. Our web-based platform allows Nonprofits to connect directly with donors, members and volunteers. Nonprofits can also organize fundraising events and post causes.

PhilanthropX is composed up of a group of talented individuals working hard to help people help others. Our site helps you find other people who share your philanthropic interests and the organizations and politicians who are already working in those areas. Located in the heart of San Diego, we hope to spread our efforts throughout the world.

There is no shortage of either human capital or economic resources available to address social issues. The best way we can make the most of our resources is by working together. PhilanthropX was established to create a single meeting place for these individuals and the organizations they represent where ideas can be exchanged and partnerships found. Our team strives to deliver assistance, hope and change more efficiently.

PhilanthropX allows you to:

1) Connect with organizations.

2) Connect with people who share your interests.

3) Stay informed about philanthropy.

4) Learn how you can make a difference.

5) Blog about your project or cause.

PhilanthropX - Join the conversation.
